member.name: T:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService
member.summary: Provides methods to interact with records.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.#ctor(FileCabinetApp.IRecordValidator)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.CreateRecord(FileCabinetApp.RecordParametersTransfer)
member.summary: Creates new records with given parameters.
member.param: Object to transfer parameters of new record.
member.exception: Throw when first name or last name is null, when transfer object is null.

Thrown when firs name or last name length is out of 2 and 60 chars or contains only whitespaces, when date of birth out of 01-Jan-1950 and current date, when height is out of 1 and 300 cm, when income is negative, when patronymic letter is not a latin uppercase letter.

member.name: M:FileCabinetApp.FileCabinetService.EditRecord(System.Int32,FileCabinetApp.RecordParametersTransfer)
member.summary: Edits existing record.
member.param: ID of a record to edit.
Object to transfer new parameters to existing record.
member.exception: Throw when first name or last name is null, when transfer object is null.

Thrown when firs name or last name length is out of 2 and 60 chars or contains only whitespaces, when date of birth out of 01-Jan-1950 and current date, when height is out of 1 and 300 cm, when income is negative, when patronymic letter is not a latin uppercase letter.
